Reviews.Title: “A Roman Treasure”
Reviews.Author: Ex-airfaircrew
Reviews.Content: tucked tiny backstreet vatican city charming hotel offers peaceful retreat wonderful hectic craziness rome literally steps vatican museums stpeters basilica array trattorias visit hotel walked rome location occasions spacious highceilinged spotless hotel offers wonderful garden perfect reading andor relaxing day touring breakfast feast eyes stomach makes hotel truly familyrun atmosphere 5 night stay extended family care service provided wonderful touring restuarant recommendations definitely stay future trips rome
